1397690.name: Axion Strike
1397690.description:
Axion Strike brings fast-paced FPS action into a colorful, cartoon-inspired battlefield. Dive into intense multiplayer matches where precision meets chaos — every shot, explosion, and takedown bursts with vibrant style. Whether you’re dueling solo or teaming up with friends, every round feels alive with energy, humor, and a touch of madness.

Dominate across dynamic maps filled with personality and color. With smooth controls, striking visuals, and ever-evolving content, Axion Strike delivers a fresh and exciting take on the classic shooter experience — one where skill meets creativity in a world that doesn’t take itself too seriously.
1397690.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 土耳其语
